Name: Shoot. Push. Repeat.
About the game: This fun and dynamic clicker puzzle game will not leave anyone indifferent! You have to deliver the blue ball to the desired point using only the laws of physics! The game is a worthy successor to the Oik series, taking only the best from it. A huge number of various puzzles will not leave anyone indifferent! Powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5
